channel.title: Getting 508 client to work on Windows 7 64bit? rep++
channel.description: I know htis is the wrong section, but i already posted in the client help section, and no one ever replies to my questions there. Ive been trying to get a 508 client to run on my windows 7 64bit computer, and i just cant get it to work. Ive tried using different clients, all sorts of things. In the end i always get error_game_dll. If anyone can help ill rep++. Thanks.
